= Labs Capsule =

#type:     node
#context:  sop
#internal: labs::capsule::1.0
#icon:     /labs_icons/sidefxlabs_default.svg
#since:    20.5

This node generates a capsule mesh. The capsule is a cylinder with hemispherical caps at each end.

@parameters
    Direction:
        #id: direction
        The direction of the shape.

    Radius:
        #id: radius
        Defines the radius of the capsule.

    Height:
        #id: height
        Determines the height of the cylinder where the hemispherical ends are excluded.

    Sides:
        #id: sides
        Determines the number of sides the capsule has.

    Body Segments:
        #id: bodysegments
        Determines the number of polygon segments the cylindrical part of the capsule has along its height.

    Cap Segments:
        #id: capsegments
        Determines the number of polygon segments the hemispherical ends have along their height.
